info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:54PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Spartanburg and Cherokee Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 354 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Gaffney, or near Cowpens National Battlefield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gaffney, Blacksburg, Mayo, Cowpens National Battlefield, Cherokee Falls, Draytonville and Thicketty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
